Key Match Events: Arshdeep Singh bowled Paul Stirling with the final delivery of the third over
Mark Adair removed Virat Kohli for just one
Ben White removed Suryakumar Yadav late on
Rishabh Pant’s unbeaten 36 saw India home in style
Post-Match Reflections: India captain Rohit Sharma called correctly at the toss and elected to field first
Ireland’s next fixture in Group A is against Canada on Friday, 7 June at the same ground
Miscellaneous Highlights: A feverish New York crowd of 20,604 welcomed the Ireland team to the middle
A 27-run partnership from Gareth Delany (26) and Josh Little (14) gave Ireland late hope of a competitive total
The match was played on a heavily bowler-friendly surface
Others: India maintained their number one ranking in T20Is
